headline: GE Vernova Expects More Trouble for Struggling Offshore Wind Industry
summary: (Bloomberg) -- GE Vernova Inc., the maker of the biggest offshore wind turbines in the Western hemisphere, sees grim prospects for a beleaguered industry that’s facing slowing demand and weak pricing. headline: Stock market today: Asian shares are mostly higher, tracking a rally on Wall Street
summary: Shares were mostly higher Thursday in Asia after Wall Street resumed its upward climb, as an update on inflation appeared to clear the way for more help for the economy from the Federal Reserve.  Tokyo's Nikkei 225 index advanced 1.2% to 39,849.14, led by buying of technology shares.  Advantest Corp., which makes equipment for testing computer chips, gained 5.1%, while chip maker Tokyo Electron was up 0.6%.

headline: Watch These GE Vernova Price Levels as Stock Jumps After Investor Update
summary: GE Vernova shares gained 5% on Wednesday, one day after the energy equipment maker raised its long-term sales outlook, declared a dividend and announced a stock-buyback plan. Monitor these key chart levels.
